body_html:
i can't clearly understand but ;
--if you want to say it takes a long time with CPU training, yes it is and if you want to have compute power you should use gpu(mostly nvidia gpu if you dont want to deal with amd gpu software issues)
-- i installed gpu & cpu support before but i am just newbie and that was like 1,5 years ago. they were working fine together.

So my basic recommendation is if its working, go with cpu mode.

Regards.

body:
i can't clearly understand but ;
--if you want to say it takes a long time with CPU training, yes it is and if you want to have compute power you should use gpu(mostly nvidia gpu if you dont want to deal with amd gpu software issues)
-- i installed gpu & cpu support before but i am just newbie and that was like 1,5 years ago. they were working fine together.

So my basic recommendation is if its working, go with cpu mode.

Regards.
